comments.body:
no need to use val keep the array length
`val al = a.length; val bl = b.length; val limit = if (al <= bl) al else bl` convert to 13 instructions
`if (x.length <= y.length) x.length else y.length` convert to 11 instructions

How about just a `min`? EDIT: Oh I see the comment above. I'd expect it's just inlined by JIT anyway? not a big deal either way. But you would save a reference to `.length` with `min`, so kind of expect it's better.
